product.title: Herstyler Colorful Seasons Ceramic Flat Iron, Dual Voltage, 1.25 Inch Pink
product.description: Herstyler Colorful Pink Flat Iron, a versatile ceramic flat iron with dual voltage capabilities. This travel-friendly hair straightener delivers silky smooth results, thanks to its advanced technology and negative ion feature. Safeguard your hair from damage while enjoying effortless styling on the go!
product.description_html: Herstyler Colorful Pink Flat Iron, a versatile ceramic flat iron with dual voltage capabilities. This travel-friendly hair straightener delivers silky smooth results, thanks to its advanced technology and negative ion feature. Safeguard your hair from damage while enjoying effortless styling on the go!
product.description_full:
Herstyler Colorful Pink Flat Iron, a versatile ceramic flat iron with dual voltage capabilities. This travel-friendly hair straightener delivers silky smooth results, thanks to its advanced technology and negative ion feature. Safeguard your hair from damage while enjoying effortless styling on the go! * MODERN MARVEL - Designed with many innovative features like Negative Ion Technology, Dual Temperature, Floating Plates, this anti static flat iron is the answer to your bad hair days.
   
   
 * REDUCES FRIZZ - Use of negative ion technology helps this ceramic hair straightener combat frizz and static by neutralizing hair atoms. This straightening iron leaves hair smooth and glossy.
   
   
 * SUITS ALL HAIR TYPES - With dual voltage and adjustable temperature between 180 to 460 degrees F, this pink flat iron suits all hair types, whether long, short, thick, thin, frizzy or straight.
   
   
 * EASY TO USE - With a long 360 degree swivel cord for easy movement, flexible floating plate technology and easy grip handles, the Colorful Seasons Flat Iron makes hair straightening a breeze.
   
   
 * TRAVEL DELIGHT - Light and compact, this dual flat iron is a traveler's delight. It works on both 110 - 120 V and 220 - 240 V, is portable and can be used in any part of the globe.
product.description_full_html:
Herstyler Colorful Pink Flat Iron, a versatile ceramic flat iron with dual voltage capabilities. This travel-friendly hair straightener delivers silky smooth results, thanks to its advanced technology and negative ion feature. Safeguard your hair from damage while enjoying effortless styling on the go!
  • MODERN MARVEL - Designed with many innovative features like Negative Ion Technology, Dual Temperature, Floating Plates, this anti static flat iron is the answer to your bad hair days.

  • REDUCES FRIZZ - Use of negative ion technology helps this ceramic hair straightener combat frizz and static by neutralizing hair atoms. This straightening iron leaves hair smooth and glossy.

  • SUITS ALL HAIR TYPES - With dual voltage and adjustable temperature between 180 to 460 degrees F, this pink flat iron suits all hair types, whether long, short, thick, thin, frizzy or straight.

  • EASY TO USE - With a long 360 degree swivel cord for easy movement, flexible floating plate technology and easy grip handles, the Colorful Seasons Flat Iron makes hair straightening a breeze.

  • TRAVEL DELIGHT - Light and compact, this dual flat iron is a traveler's delight. It works on both 110 - 120 V and 220 - 240 V, is portable and can be used in any part of the globe.

protection_plans.title: Walmart Protection Plan - 2-Year Plan
protection_plans.description: Protect it today, enjoy it for years. Get award-winning Allstate service and support that goes above and beyond the manufacturer’s warranty. Health & beauty plans cover: Mechanical & electrical failures Breakdowns or failures during normal use Fast repairs & replacements with easy online claims available 24/7Includes 100% parts & labor with no hidden fees When you add your new health & beauty item to cart, be sure to add a Walmart Protection Plan, too. Simply add your plan at checkout. There’s no need to register your plan for it to be active. We’ll email you protection plan details after you check out.
